user.title: Virtual device configuration
user.description:
Enter a friendly name for the new virtual device.
You'll be able to add virtual entities later.

entity_add.title: Add entities
entity_add.description:
Choose a module to associate with the newly added entity.
You can also add multiple entities at once.

entity_copy.title: Copy entities
entity_copy.description:
Choose the entity that you want to copy.
You can also make multiple copies at once.

entity_edit.title: Edit an entity
entity_edit.description: Choose the entity that you want to edit.

entity_remove.title: Remove an entity
entity_remove.description:
Choose the entity that you want to remove.
You will also need to remove it using entity settings.

entity_editor.title: Entity editor ({entity_index} of {entity_count})
entity_editor.description:
You're editing entity {entity_index} of {entity_count}.
The chosen module is: {module}
